info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 09 at 7:10PM MST until August 09 at 9:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST/9 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING FOR NORTHWESTERN MOHAVE AND NORTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTIES... At 710 PM MST /710 PM PDT/, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly at Lake Mead including the Overton Arm, Temple Bar, and South Cove. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Overton, Moapa Valley, Temple Bar Campground, Echo Bay, Echo Bay Campground, South Cove, Overton Beach, Meadview, Valley Of Fire, Grand Canyon Ranch, Pierce Ferry And Antares Roads and Temple Bar. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
